Articles.Content: I tried turning this on, but it didn't seem to make a change.  Could someone explain this to me?  Thanks!
Activates the vertical snap for surface attached parts in VAB. If set to  true, you can olny surface attach pars at fixed heights.  Not sure if it is still working. Las time I tried it was 0.23.5

1 hour ago, DoToH said:

Activates the vertical snap for surface attached parts in VAB. If set to  true, you can olny surface attach pars at fixed heights.  Not sure if it is still working. Las time I tried it was 0.23.5

Oh, interesting.  Could someone show me how to set up something to toggle it on/off in the VAB/SPH?  I didn't notice a change, but I think I might not have turned on regular angle snap.

1 hour ago, Mad Rocket Scientist said:

Oh, interesting.  Could someone show me how to set up something to toggle it on/off in the VAB/SPH?  I didn't notice a change, but I think I might not have turned on regular angle snap.

Tested. Not working for me in 1.0.5.
